thread.title: What time does the Star Wars Battlefront beta end? - Gaming
thread.title_full: What time does the Star Wars Battlefront beta end? - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Megan Davies
title: What time does the Star Wars Battlefront beta end? - Gaming
text: Updated story: Star Wars Battlfront's beta ends today - but at what time?EA has announced the free PS4, Xbox One and PC teaser ends at 4pm UK time, which is probably just enough time to download and get a few matches in, if you haven't already.Set your clocks as the #StarWarsBattlefront Beta goes offline in just under 11 hours! October 13th, 8 AM PST / 5 PM CEST.— EAStarWars (@EAStarWars) October 13, 2015Original story: Good news for everyone who can't get enough of testing out Star Wars Battlefront - EA have extended the game's open beta until October 13.The Star Wars Battlefront beta began on October 8 and was expected to end by Sunday (October 11) night but the developer has since announced they will be running additional tests and adding an extra day to the beta. © EA Star Wars Battlefront beta: Everything you need to know to sign up and start playing on PS4, Xbox One and PC"As we get into the late stages of the beta, we will begin conducting further technical tests on our infrastructure," EA announced in a statement on their website."These additional tests will start on Monday, October 12 and will run through Tuesday, October 13, which will add an additional day to the open beta. "These tests are to help us find some extreme scenarios, and that means some players may experience occasional issues such as being kicked from the game or losing connectivity. This is all being done in the name of shoring up our infrastructure before we launch."The beta allows fans to try out three different game modes across three of the planets. There's Walker Assault on Hoth, Drop Zone on Sullust and Survival Mission on Tatooine.The full game is set to launch on November 20 for PS4, Xbox One and PC.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
